pullrequest.title: add or remove constraints dynamically using gazebo create_joint_dynamically branch

content.raw:
I made some changes upstream in [gazebo pull request #1938](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/1938/adding-model-createjoint-method-that/diff), now I see a segfault on test exit (unload world):

~~~
INTEGRATION_sim_api: /usr/include/boost/smart_ptr/shared_ptr.hpp:653: typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type boost::shared_ptr<T>::operator->() const [with T = gazebo::physics::World; typename boost::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type = gazebo::physics::World*]: Assertion `px != 0' failed.

Program received signal SIGABRT, Aborted.
[Switching to Thread 0x7fffca8de700 (LWP 25941)]

56      ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c: No such file or directory.
